title: Create customer segmentation based on product-propensities
description: Develop an AI model to segment customers based on their product-propensities. The model should use customer data such as demographics, behavior, recent usage of services, and transaction history. The model should be trained on a representative sample of customers and validated on a hold-out set. The model should be deployed on the Analytical-Cluster and integrated with the Marketing Rule Engine to create targeted messages.
acceptanceCriteria: The AI model should achieve an accuracy of at least 80% on the hold-out set.
The model should be deployed on the Analytical-Cluster.
The model should be integrated with the Marketing Rule Engine.

clarifications.question: What is the expected size of the representative sample?
clarifications.answer: The representative sample should have at least 10,000 customers.

clarifications.question: What is the expected time-frame for model development?
clarifications.answer: The model development should be completed within 2 months.

title: Create marketing rules for targeted messages based on customer segmentation
description: Create marketing rules based on the customer segmentation developed by the Data Scientist. The rules should allow me to filter customers based on their product-propensities and create targeted messages via inbound and outbound channels. The rules should also comply with regulatory requirements and prevent spamming customers. The system should provide a user-friendly interface to create, edit, and delete rules.
acceptanceCriteria: The marketing rules should be based on the customer segmentation developed by the Data Scientist.
The rules should comply with regulatory requirements.
The system should provide a user-friendly interface to create, edit, and delete rules.

clarifications.question: What are the regulatory requirements to be complied with?
clarifications.answer: The rules should comply with GDPR and other relevant regulations.

clarifications.question: What are the inbound and outbound channels to be used?
clarifications.answer: The inbound channels are email, SMS, and push notifications. The outbound channels are website, mobile app, and call center.
